html: The Trump Admin should listen to residents, law enforcement & experts who live/work in our border communities & stop promoting the false narrative that our border is in crisis when in reality border cities in U.S. consistently have some of the lowest crime rates in the country.

html: “I don’t see a crisis as Washington says there’s a crisis,” said Clint McDonald, executive director of the Southwest Border Sheriffs’ Coalition on Sessions visit to Las Cruces.
